algorithm_technique: Sort elements by value then index, then iterate marking smallest unmarked and its neighbors.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the score by repeatedly marking the smallest unmarked element and its neighbors.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily select the smallest unmarked element, add its value to the score, and mark it and its adjacent elements until all are marked.
key_insights: The greedy choice of picking the smallest unmarked element at each step leads to the optimal solution.
Sorting the elements by value and then index ensures the correct selection order.
A boolean array is used to efficiently track which elements have been marked.
